SELECT bp.name, CASE WHEN bp.sex = 1 THEN '男' WHEN bp.sex = 0 THEN '女' ELSE '未知' END AS gender, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,bp.birthday,CURDATE()) as age, hd.dname, bd.disease, bd.create_time as outpatientTime, ts.name as tsName, bpia.quantity, bpia.treatment_quantity, bo.create_time as outpatient_time, bpit.cure_start_time, bpit.id as prescriptionItemTaskId, bpit.patient_id, bpit.outpatient_id, bpit.entity_id, bpit.cure_user_id, bpit.registrant_id, bpit.department_id, bpit.customer_id FROM bu_prescription_item_task bpit LEFT JOIN bu_patient bp ON bpit.patient_id = bp.id AND bp.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN hs_department hd ON bpit.department_id = hd.id AND hd.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN bu_outpatient bo ON bpit.outpatient_id = bo.id AND bo.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN bu_diagnose bd ON bpit.outpatient_id = bd.outpatient_id AND bd.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN bu_prescription_item_appointment bpia ON bpit.prescription_item_appointment_id = bpia.id AND bpia.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN ts_sytech ts ON bpit.entity_id = ts.id AND ts.is_del = 0 WHERE bpit.is_del = 0 AND bpit.cure_status = 2
AND (bp.name LIKE concat('%',#{itemTaskRo.search},'%') OR bp.phone LIKE concat('%',#{itemTaskRo.search},'%'))
AND bpit.department_id = #{itemTaskRo.departmentId}
AND (bd.create_time between #{itemTaskRo.startDate} AND #{itemTaskRo.endDate})
ORDER BY bpit.cure_status,bpit.signature_time DESC

SELECT bp.name, bp.phone, CASE WHEN bp.sex = 1 THEN '男' WHEN bp.sex = 0 THEN '女' ELSE '未知' END AS gender, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,bp.birthday,CURDATE()) as age, bd.disease, bd.syndrome, bo.create_time as outpatient_time, bpi.name as tsName, bpi.detail, bpit.id as prescriptionItemTaskId, bpit.prescription_id, bpit.patient_id, bpit.outpatient_id, bpit.entity_id, bpit.cure_user_id, bpit.registrant_id, bpit.create_time, bpit.cure_status, bpit.cure_start_time, hu.user_name AS cureUserName, hu1.user_name AS registrantName FROM bu_prescription_item_task bpit LEFT JOIN bu_patient bp ON bpit.patient_id = bp.id AND bp.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN bu_outpatient bo ON bpit.outpatient_id = bo.id AND bo.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN bu_diagnose bd ON bpit.outpatient_id = bd.id AND bd.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN hs_user hu ON bpit.cure_user_id = hu.id AND hu.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN hs_user hu1 ON bpit.registrant_id = hu1.id AND hu1.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN bu_prescription_item bpi ON bpit.prescription_item_id = bpi.id AND bpi.is_del = 0 WHERE bpit.is_del = 0 and bpit.id = #{id}
